allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
[Feature] Refine logging and add logIn/logOut methods for sync managers

- Remove trackEvent helper functions, use direct logger?.trackEvent calls
- Remove managerInitialized event from all managers
- Update event name prefixes: DocManA_, ColManA_, DocManS_, ColManS_
- Change all success events to .info type (remove .analytic)
- Add logIn() and logOut() methods following ProgressManager pattern
- Add clearCaches parameter to stopListening() for data cleanup
- Implement pending writes cleanup when newer writes succeed
- Add pendingWritesCleared and cachesCleared events
